channel.title: How do i change the name of an item?
channel.description:
ok how do i change the name of an item and the examine of the item because i changed the glowing dagger into a different name in itemdef.xml and the name or examine i changed is not in-game but when i spawn it, it comes up as the item name i changed in the EasyRSC control panel it says
[Staff] Glade spawned themself 1 Zafe(s)
So if u can help me change the name in-game of the item and the examine i changed it would be great help. Thank You!

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:11, topic:274803”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=363055.msg2758943#msg2758943 date=1240409368]

Items.rscd

-Kozy

stop posting or explain (He couldn’t find the Item.rscd)

Omg, people have stopped searching now?
Does people ask for every little thing now?
[/quote]

It looks that way. However, putting together a noob friendly tutorial will hopefully prevent this from happening ^^[/quote]

You think so but no.
Your TuT should help alot of people but you will see unlimited questions of stuffs you have in your TuT.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

All you have to do is change the name and description of the item in the ItemsDef.xml file. Once edited, make sure you compress it and replace (overwriting) your existing compressed .rar file (server side).

Then decompress your Items.rscd file, edit it and save. Once saved, compress it and replace (overwriting) your existing Items.rscd file (client side).

[edit] You’re welcome ^^

Read full topic
